item.title: My Way Home
item.description: There are lots of movies describing how a person overcomes all difficulties to finally get home. Usually, I consider those movies are too dramatic and those won't happen in our real life. Well, now I have to admit that art originates from the mundane and my way home during COVID is surely enough to make a movie just like others..
